name: Extraction (itch) (MatteusWilson)
description:
Extraction is a movement shooter game about entering a mine shaft and dealing with enemies at a high speed. From an abandoned cowboy town jump deep into the mines and see how well you can do, and what you are able to extract.

Features:

  • A trusty revolver
  • An amazing grappling hook
  • Hordes of terrifying enemies
  • Doors, buttons, and all sorts of moving platforms

Credits:
Emil Granados
Hiroto Harris
Tyler Martinez
Matteus Wilson
Zhengxuan Xie
